name: Wipeout 2793
description:
This game was created for a group project at the SAE Institute (Sydney Campus). 

Creators:

  • Thomas List (PerfectPunch) 
  • Isaac Garpendal (Papagarp)
  • Steven Nielsen

Story:

The player is competing in a futuristic version of the TV show ‘Wipeout’ based in the year 2793. Contestants would have to navigate through obstacle courses made to look like ancient ruins.  

Goal:

  1. Players have to achieve the lowest score possible. This can be done by completing the obstacle course as fast as they can. 
  2. Coins can be collected to decrease your score once a level is finished.
  3. Keys can be used to unlock doors that are blocking your way to the finish line.
  4. A 'high jump' power-up can be collected to help the player reach high platforms.
  5. Be careful, falling off a platform may result in you landing in water. In this case your running speed is decreased and you'll be unable to jump.   
 Controls:
  • Look - Mouse
  • Move - W, A, S, D
  • Pause - Escape

Assets Used: 

  • Music: https://www.bensound.com/
  • SFX: 
    • Sound Effects Pack: http://www.gameburp.com/free-game-sound-fx/
    • Free Sounds: https://freesound.org
  • Models - Unreal Engine Marketplace: 
    • Infinity Blade: Warriors
    • Infinity Blade: Grass Lands
  • Itch.io Page Background: http://patternico.com/
